labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: It just makes you join without a modal
data.expected_result: A join server modal opens like when you click a link in a browser.
data.short_description: When you click an invite link in a channel description, you don't get a join modal
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a server where a channel description has a partner invite link to a server you aren't currently in - Click that invite link - Observe
